name: EBForeNotification

description: 不再更新，请使用新库 EBBannerView，经过重写包含更多强大功能，提供 iOS9/10/11 样式，更可自定义。No more update, please use new pod ‘EBBannerView’, more powerfull and more features https://github.com/pikacode/EBBannerView
